name: Node-REDSmartHomeControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, pause Lounge TV”
”Alexa, switch input to HDMI 1 on Lounge TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this bridge you can control a variety of Node-RED endpoints, such as MQTT, HTTP(S), Yamaha AVRs, Chromecast (anything that has a Node-RED integration). This bridge currently supports Power, Brightness, Colour, Colour Temperature, Input, Lock, Thermostat, Playback, Step Speaker and Scene control.

You'll need to follow the instructions here to get up and running: https://red.cb-net.co.uk/docs
